      • addDataToQueueOrMap

        public static void addDataToQueueOrMap(int selfID,
                                       EventQueue eventQueue,
                                       EventType eventType,
                                       DataMap dataMap,
                                       Data data)
        Add the Data to EventQueue or DataMap. If the Data is operation data, add it to the DataMap; else if the Data isData, and the bodyType of the Data is DataType.SIMPLE_LIST, add it to the EventQueue
        Parameters:
        selfID - the ID of current worker
        eventQueue - the queue for events
        eventType - the type of the event
        dataMap - the DataMap
        data - the Data
